FuncDef:
The roam-character command sets the flag of the roaming user.
The undo roam-character command restores the default value.
By default, the flag of the roaming user is colon (:).

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the flag of the roaming user.
The value is a single character. It can be one of the following symbols:/ \ :* < > |.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the system parses the user account, it can cross out the home area information from the account name extension according to the roaming flag. The system can obtain the correct string of the domain name.
